# Schönwald im Schwarzwald

Schönwald im Schwarzwald is a small village in the state of Baden-Württemberg in the Black Forest in southwest Germany, near the France–Germany border and Germany–Switzerland border.
Notable people
It is the birthplace of Franz Ketterer, a clockmaker who was one of several possible inventors of the cuckoo clock.
Sights
* Triberg Gallows
References
External links
* [http://www.cuckooclocks.com/webcam.asp Webcam in Schoenwald]
*  [https://www.alemannische-seiten.de/deutschland/schoenwald.php Information about Schönwald]
